title: NRL gives clubs $2.5 million each to survive coronavirus crisis
description: The NRL hands out a $40 million rescue package to help clubs stay afloat as the financial impact of the coronavirus pandemic hits home.
content:
Posted 
March 30, 2020 17:19:00
NRL clubs will receive just $2.5 million each from the governing body to survive the coronavirus pandemic should the season fail to resume this year.
Key points:
